title: Opinion: RFK Jr.’s vaccine advisory panel is beset by incompetence, bias, and procedural chaos
description: The Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices' (ACIP) meetings used to be a geek’s dream: hours of long, maybe dreary presentation of extensive data followed by lengthy discussions that drilled into…
